name: TwoStatues
description:
This game is a small sokoban-like puzzle game, where you have to put all the maximum two statues into their respective place. The game has 9 levels

The trick here is that the two statues connected. One makes the other mimic it's movement while the other one make make the first one go reverse all the time.

Controls: KeyCommandarrow keysmovementESCback to main menurreload level Credits:

Graphics, programming, game design made by me.

Links

Github: https://github.com/Atanii/TwoStatues

Deviantart (tileset): https://www.deviantart.com/atanii
